name: Heavy Knight
description:
A game completed in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.
Theme: Out Of Control.

Note: Press spacebar to respawn. 

(Every level is beatable. The end screen is not visible due to errors in our build settings, so your character will start glitching out upon completing the final level. Please press ALT+F4 to close the game.)

Programming and design:
ValiantAMM
(https://twitter.com/ValiantAMM)

Caden

Art:
